ISSUE.TITLE: Allow subscription to newsletter when store is closed.
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: When the store is closed, the newsletter box is generated, but the controller action is ignored by StoreClosedAttribute. However this functionality may be important for shop to get subscribers until it opens.
